channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Apple Watch (2024): Which Model Should You Buy?
item.description: Should you splurge for the Ultra Watch 2? Or stick with the SE? Let us help you figure out which version to get (and which to avoid).

item.title: Apple looks to third parties, like Google, to help power iPhone 16’s visual search
item.description: Apple’s relationship with Google as its search partner is taking a new turn with Apple’s introduction of visual search, or “Visual Intelligence” as th...

item.title: The Best Sheets for Every Body, Bed, and Budget (2024)
item.description: Which material should you buy? Percale or linen? We tested dozens of sheets to find our favorites and break it all down.

item.title: Creator startup Spotter raises another $7.4M
item.description: Spotter, a startup that underwrites creators and offers AI tools, raised $7.4 million, according to a Form D filing viewed by TechCrunch. A representa...

item.title: Apple Must Pay $14.4 Billion to Ireland in Crackdown On ‘Sweetheart Deals’
item.description: The European Court of Justice has ordered Apple to pay billions in back taxes to Ireland, in a move that hands a victory to the European Commission ag...

item.title: Spare fixes cities’ outdated transport services for disabled residents
item.description: Cities spend hundreds of millions each year on paratransit services, or public rides for disabled residents, yet those services remain limited and unp...

item.title: An Underwater Data Center in San Francisco Bay? Regulators Say Not So Fast
item.description: The YC-backed startup NetworkOcean plans to sink GPUs into San Francisco Bay. Multiple California regulators WIRED spoke with hadn’t heard about the t...

item.title: Lucid Motors’ Gravity SUV will have Tesla charging built in
item.description: Lucid Motors is just a few months away from finally launching its electric SUV, and the company now says the upcoming vehicle — dubbed Gravity — will ...

item.title: He Worked for a Law Firm Consulting on an Anti-Trans Supreme Court Case. Then We Asked About These Racist Posts

item.title: MariaDB goes private with new CEO as K1 closes acquisition
item.description: MariaDB‘s short-lived tenure as a public company is all but over, as the struggling database business is now fully under the auspices of K1 Investment...
